item.title: Multiple Questions. [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

[quote=“OwnageDBOW, post:1, topic:265805”]I am using a Delta

  1. How do I find my ranged methods?

  2. I have a Black Partyhat

if(i == 15502){ //~black partyhat~ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1]; //Purple: 926-127 class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 128; class8.anInt174 = 2635;//Item Look class8.anInt181 = 440; class8.anInt190 = 76; class8.anInt198 = 1850; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 187; class8.anInt200 = 363; class8.anInt175 = 29; class8.anInt197 = 87; class8.aString170 = "Black Partyhat"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A Black Partyhat".getBytes(); }

What would I edit so that it looked like a Barrows Partyhat?

  1. How do I make an item give you infinite hitpoints?

4. How do I remove the special attack bar from a weapon?

  1. How do I change the attack options of a weapon?

6. How do I add requirements to a weapon?

7. How do I change the starting location?

  1. My weapons say you need defence to wield them, how do I make them require attack?

  2. Video says it all. http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2cprn02&s=5[/quote]

  3. Editing the model or using recoloring - theres tutorials on how to do these.

  4. search for public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) in wearing.java

Read full topic
